Detailed Description

Abstract Base Class ABC that groups the same of objects together.

This class groups the classes with the same properities. This class groups all interface classes that model objects from the chisimba core modules This creates less dependancy on chisimba and increases flexibility and maintainability

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010
Warning:
Do NOT rename the abstract member functions as they have to be renamed in >14 other classes
Note:
This class inherits for the object class of chisimba's core to manage objects with ease.
